abstract: Johnson & Johnson has cut the amount it will pay for its 18.4 percent stake in Irish drugmaker Elan Corp by $115 million to $885 million, Elan confirmed Monday.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson has cut the amount it will pay for its 18.4 percent stake in Irish drugmaker Elan Corp by $115 million to $885 million, Elan confirmed Monday.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson has cut the amount it will pay for its 18.4 percent stake in the Irish drugmaker Elan by $115 million to $885 million, Elan confirmed on Monday.

headline.main: J&J and Elan Cut Deal Price to Resolve Biogen Dispute
